Reviews.Title: “Bridal Tea House in Hung Hom”
Reviews.Author: IrinaPoms
Reviews.Content: We stayed in the hotel in May 2012. I found it not as bad as the reviews on here read. The room was not very small and it was clean, the beds were comfy and the toilet and the shower were clean. The staff were helpful though they do not know much English. The location is good, just a few minutes walk to the Hung Hom MRT and there are a lot of restaurants nearby. So we enjoyed our stay and I would recommend the hotel for budget travellers.

Reviews.Title: “Smallest room in the world!”
Reviews.Author: kwtum
Reviews.Content: Don't stay here ever! Bought the free easy package during kl matta fair during "promotion ". If I had known we were to get this hotel is wouldn't have paid the money. Our room was so small, the double bed looks more like a bigger single bed. The whole room could only fit one bed and one standing person. What's worst, is the hotel is surrounded by funeral parlors!

Reviews.Title: “How do they plan to build such miniature rooms?”
Reviews.Author: jacky c
Reviews.Content: So far the smallest room i could ever imagine........you dont even have place for two people to stand side by side.......once you get in the room you have to lie down on the "so called Twin beds"...the so called AC is not effective n not controlled by you.....no place to keep your luggage......only small one bag it is OK....but more than one then you have to place it on you after you sleep...literally..and yes....lots of cockroach. DONT GO there even if it is offered free...

Reviews.Title: “Clean, good value for money”
Reviews.Author: dmansy
Reviews.Content: The size of the room is ok for Hong Kong standards although the bathroom is very small. Rooms are clean. Tv only had 2 channels. Overall a good choice.

Reviews.Title: “Make sure to book the DELUXE room !”
Reviews.Author: RaniGirl
Reviews.Content: I stayed here some time back, and booked the room over the net. Upon arrival I entered one of the smallest hotel rooms I have seen in my life! Upon presenting the print outs of what I thought I was getting, I was told that the pic's were of the DELUXE room. For about $80.00HK extra per night, I was give a room more than twice the size with a couch etc. I would highly recommend this hotel. The staff for the most part were pleasant and helpful. It is a good 10 minute walk from the subway system, and there are heaps of buses at your doorstep that will take you anywhere you want to go, just get yourself a good map.

Reviews.Title: “Please don't even think of it if they offer free stay also”
Reviews.Author: AshNagpur
Reviews.Content: The worst hotel have come across. Very arrogant and worst staff at night shift during my stay... Very very small rooms... worst room services... the smallest bathroom I have ever seen in my life... Air Conditioner temp is controlled from the reception itself.. Worst room services.....

Reviews.Title: “Unusual interesting location”
Reviews.Author: KatjeBrussels
Reviews.Content: Very good value for money. The hotel is slightly far from the main tourist attractions but in a very nice neighbourhood with restaurants, shops and anything you might need. The rooms are of decent size (for Hong kong) and full of light plus they offer a good range of complimentary bath products and drinks that make the stay pleasant and provide a service above the price you are paying. Staff is also quite helpful. A short taxi ride will take you to the more touristy areas.
